sentence.Network_en: The tragedy is developed form the bacchanal doxology as one part of the fete ceremony of Dionysus.
sentence.Network_cn: 悲剧作为狄俄尼索斯祭祀仪式的一部分，是由酒神颂歌发展而来的。

sentence.Network_en: His eye was alight, his color coppery, his air swagger, devil - may - care, bacchanal.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的眼睛发亮,面发铜色, 态度傲慢,不顾一切地发着酒疯.

PerfectNetExp.abs: TOEFL词汇 - 豆丁网 ... baby-sit vt. 看管(婴孩) bacchanal a. 祭祀酒神的;酒神 back-breaking a. 使人劳累之极的；断人腰背的.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B) ... bacchae 酒神之女伴 bacchanal 酒神的 bacchanalian 酒神节的.
babyish 孩子气的bacchanal 狂饮作乐者bacchant 酗酒的
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... shindy n. 吵闹，盛大舞会，宴会 bacchanal n. (行为放纵的)狂欢会 | bacchanalian adj. 狂欢的,行为放纵的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin bacchanalis, from the name of the god Bacchus

means.word_mean: 1. someone who engages in drinking bouts
2. a drunken reveller; a devotee of Bacchus
3. a wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity

auth_sentence.content: Behrajan won the race which was marred by the death of popular chaser Bacchanal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Behrajan won the race which was marred by the death of popular chaser Bacchanal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Behrajan won the race which was marred by the death of popular chaser Bacchanal.

auth_sentence.content: The feeling that you've been dropped into some night-time woodland pagan bacchanal is tough to shake.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The feeling that you've been dropped into some night-time woodland pagan bacchanal is tough to shake.

auth_sentence.content: The grain in great piles did not attract bears until in the ripeness of time it fermented and then the bears staged a bacchanal.
